8f2f16266b0cffec3640afdaf59413c075ee9cd2ace630c86","license":"Apache-2.0","urls":["bzz-raw://18ce9e8f399fb50bc8d3c5ca300b16e603ca733be4335ebf111339b957b99284","dweb:/ipfs/QmfEHjVyCgAKE8Humuu6WPCDqLk6BDkeHLBURYEqDfmooT"]}},"version":1}

params._currency: The currency of the offer that is to be accepted.
params._listingId: The unique ID of the listing for which to accept the offer.
params._offeror: The address of the buyer whose offer is to be accepted.
params._totalPrice: The total price of the offer that is to be accepted.

buy(uint256,address,uint256,address,uint.details: A sale will fail to execute if either:          (1) buyer does not own or has not approved Marketplace to transfer the appropriate              amount of currency (or hasn't sent the appropriate amount of native tokens)          (2) the lister does not own or has removed Marketplace's              approval to transfer the tokens listed for sale.

params._buyFor: The receiver of the NFT being bought.
params._currency: The currency to pay the price in.
params._listingId: The uid of the direct listing to buy from.
params._quantity: The amount of NFTs to buy from the direct listing.
params._totalPrice: The total price to pay for the tokens being bought.

params._listingId: The unique Id of the listing to cancel.

params._closeFor: For whom the auction is being closed - the auction creator or winning bidder.
params._listingId: The uid of the listing (the auction to close).

contractType().details: Returns the module type of the contract.

contractURI().details: Returns the metadata URI of the contract.

contractVersion().details: Returns the version of the contract.

createListing((address,uint256,uint256,u.details: NFTs to list for sale in an auction are escrowed in Marketplace. For direct listings, the contract       only checks whether the listing's creator owns and has approved Marketplace to transfer the NFTs to list.

params._params: The parameters that govern the listing to be created.

getPlatformFeeInfo().details: Returns the platform fee bps and recipient.

offer(uint256,uint256,address,uint256,ui.details: Each (address, listing ID) pair maps to a single unique offer. So e.g. if a buyer makes       makes two offers to the same direct listing, the last offer is counted as the buyer's       offer to that listing.

params._currency: For auction listings: the 'currency of the bid' is the currency accepted                           by the auction, regardless of the value of `_currency` passed. For direct                           listings: this is the currency in which the offer is made.
params._expirationTimestamp: For auction listings: inapplicable. For direct listings: The timestamp after which                              the seller can no longer accept the offer.
params._listingId: The unique ID of the listing to make an offer/bid to.
params._pricePerToken: For direct listings: offered price per token. For auction listings: the bid                           amount per token. The total offer/bid amount is `_quantityWanted * _pricePerToken`.
params._quantityWanted: For auction listings: the 'quantity wanted' is the total amount of NFTs                           being auctioned, regardless of the value of `_quantityWanted` passed.                           For direct listings: `_quantityWanted` is the quantity of NFTs from the                           listing, for which the offer is being made.

setContractURI(string).details: Sets contract URI for the storefront-level metadata of the contract.       Only module admin can call this function.

setPlatformFeeInfo(address,uint256).details: Lets a module admin update the fees on primary sales.

params._buyoutPricePerToken: For direct listings: interpreted as 'price per token' listed. For auctions: if                               `buyoutPricePerToken` is greater than 0, and a bidder's bid is at least as great as                               `buyoutPricePerToken * quantityToList`, the bidder wins the auction, and the auction                               is closed.
params._currencyToAccept: For direct listings: the currency in which a buyer must pay the listing's fixed price                               to buy the NFT(s). For auctions: the currency in which the bidders must make bids.
params._listingId: The uid of the listing to edit.
params._quantityToList: The amount of NFTs to list for sale in the listing. For direct listings, the contract                               only checks whether the listing creator owns and has approved Marketplace to transfer                               `_quantityToList` amount of NFTs to list for sale. For auction listings, the contract                               ensures that exactly `_quantityToList` amount of NFTs to list are escrowed.
params._reservePricePerToken: For direct listings: this value is ignored. For auctions: the minimum bid amount of                               the auction is `reservePricePerToken * quantityToList`
params._secondsUntilEndTime: No. of seconds after the provided `_startTime`, after which the listing is inactive.                               For direct listings: 'inactive' means NFTs cannot be bought from the listing.                               For auctions: 'inactive' means bids can no longer be made in the auction.
params._startTime: The unix timestamp after which listing is active. For direct listings:                               'active' means NFTs can be bought from the listing. For auctions,                               'active' means bids can be made in the auction.

acceptOffer(uint256,address,address,uint.notice: Lets a listing's creator accept an offer to their direct listing.

buy(uint256,address,uint256,address,uint.notice: Lets someone buy a given quantity of tokens from a direct listing by paying the fixed price.

cancelDirectListing(uint256).notice: Lets a direct listing creator cancel their listing.

closeAuction(uint256,address).notice: Lets any account close an auction on behalf of either the (1) auction's creator, or (2) winning bidder.              For (1): The auction creator is sent the winning bid amount.              For (2): The winning bidder is sent the auctioned NFTs.

createListing((address,uint256,uint256,u.notice: Lets a token owner list tokens (ERC 721 or ERC 1155) for sale in a direct listing, or an auction.

offer(uint256,uint256,address,uint256,ui.notice: Lets someone make an offer to a direct listing, or bid in an auction.

updateListing(uint256,uint256,uint256,ui.notice: Lets a listing's creator edit the listing's parameters. A direct listing can be edited whenever.          An auction listing cannot be edited after the auction has started.

documentation.text: @notice Type of the tokens that can be listed for sale.
@dev Emitted when a new listing is created.
@dev Emitted when the parameters of a listing are updated.
@dev Emitted when a listing is cancelled.

@dev Emitted when a buyer buys from a direct listing, or a lister accepts some
      buyer's offer to their direct listing.
@dev Emitted when (1) a new offer is made to a direct listing, or (2) when a new bid is made in an auction.
@dev Emitted when an auction is closed.
@dev Emitted when auction buffers are updated.

@notice Lets a direct listing creator cancel their listing.
  @param _listingId The unique Id of the listing to cancel.
